Name: Guinea Mayonnaise
Description: A very tasty and yellowish mayonnaise.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una mayonesa muy sabrosa y amarillenta.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine sehr leckere und gelbliche Mayonnaise.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une mayonnaise très savoureuse et jaunâtre.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Una maionese molto gustosa e giallastra.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: とても美味しくて黄色がかったマヨネーズ。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma maionese muito saborosa e amarelada.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Çok lezzetli ve sarımsı bir mayonez.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 非常美味和淡黄色的蛋黄酱。
